item.title: Wagtail embeded YouTube videos
item.description: Wagtail Embed Video Wagtail is a brilliant content management service built atop of Django. It comes with all of Django’s functionality and Django Rest Framework built in for headless work making life a lot easier. In all, I really love it, especially its StreamFields. But I did stumble on one component, getting embedded videos to work correctly. Embedding videos This is harder than I feel it should be and poorly explained by the Wagtail documentation.
